public static CompositeHandler empty()

withQueryDetection

public CompositeHandler withQueryDetection(Pattern... pattern)
Deprecated. 
Returns an new handler based on this one, but including given query detection |pattern|. If there is already existing pattern, the new one will be used after.

Specified by:
withQueryDetection in class AbstractCompositeHandler<CompositeHandler>
Parameters:
pattern - Query detection pattern
